title: Shared Pad
description: A plain shared text pad that both you and the assistant can read and overwrite during the conversation.

openaiSpec.name: shared_pad
openaiSpec.description: Provides access to a persistent shared text pad (fetch or overwrite).

action.description: Whether to fetch or overwrite the shared pad.

text.description: The new text to write when action is set_pad. Ignore otherwise.

actions.name: set_pad
actions.description: Replace the pad with new text.
